thread.title_full: Spent three weeks here when relocating to Paris - Review of Citadines Place d'Italie Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: warren2012
title: Spent three weeks here when relocating to Paris
text: Good rooms with bath and small kitchen. Picard store nearby and restaurants, bars, shopping centre and major Metro station at the door. Great markets on Tuesday, Friday and Sundays within 50 metres. Good wifi and breakfast is satisfactory to get you going
